name: Toss Box
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam 70.
Limitation: The player is an inanimate object.

What is more inanimate than a simple box? So I made this really smol game in about 12 hours. Your objective is to toss the box into a specific spot in the room. Hope you enjoy and have fun!

- ManuGamesDev

Controls

Use mouse to aim
Click to toss
R to restart
Q to quit to Menu

Credits

Music by ZahranW
Graphics from Kenney
